<h3 id="X11849">X(11849)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: ANTI-MANDART-INCIRCLE AND X(3)-ABC REFLECTIONS</h3>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; (a^5-(b+c)*a^4-(2*b^2-b*c+2*c^2)*a^3+2*(b+c)*(b^2+c^2)*a^2+(b^4+c^4-b*c*(b+c)^2)*a-(b^2-c^2)^2*(b+c))*a  :  :
<br>
<b>X(11849) = 2*R*X(1)-(R-2*r)*X(3) = 2*R*X(5)-(R-2*r)*X(100)</b>
<p>X(11849) lies on these lines:{1,3}, {5,100}, {8,6914}, {10,7489}, {12,5840}, {21,5690}, {30,11491}, {49,692}, {104,1483}, {109,5399}, {140,1621}, {145,6950}, {149,6952}, {197,7517}, {355,8715}, {381,4421}, {382,11500}, {390,6891}, {404,5901}, {497,6958}, {498,6980}, {601,2177}, {632,5284}, {943,6907}, {952,3871}, {1001,3526}, {1012,11015}, {1058,6961}, {1154,5495}, {1351,9047}, {1376,1656}, {1479,6971}, {1486,7506}, {1598,1900}, {2550,6861}, {2779,10620}, {2975,5844}, {3085,6923}, {3158,7330}, {3434,6862}, {3560,5086}, {4188,10595}, {4294,6928}, {4302,10526}, {4413,5070}, {4428,5054}, {5082,6892}, {5218,6863}, {5253,10283}, {5259,11231}, {5281,6825}, {5531,7701}, {5552,6929}, {5603,6924}, {5761,6361}, {5762,7676}, {5779,6600}, {6913,11517}, {6921,10596}, {6922,10386}, {6930,7080}, {6938,10528}, {6955,10587}, {6959,10531}, {6966,10806}, {9301,11494}, {9654,10093}, {9669,11502}, {10058,10950}, {10087,10944}, {10742,10942}, {11490,11842}</p>
<p>
X(11849) = midpoint of X(3871) and X(6906)<br>
X(11849) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3,35), (11014,1385)<br>
X(11849) = circumcircle-inverse-of-X(10225)<br>
X(11849) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,3,37535), (3,3295,10246), (3,8148,11249), (3,10247,56), (3,10679,1482), (55,10310,10267), (55,11248,3), (55,11507,3295), (55,11509,11508), (1385,2077,3), (2077,3746,1385), (3560,5687,5790), (3579,10902,3), (3746,5919,3295), (4421,11496,11499), (5217,11249,3), (5537,10902,3579), (10267,11248,10310), (11496,11499,381), (11508,11509,999)<br>
</p>
